channel.title: How to update Scrypto simulator
channel.description:
1) Pull the latest changes from https://github.com/radixdlt/radixdlt-scrypto 2) `rustup update stable` 3) `cargo install --path ./simulator` 4) `resim reset`
*Solution by cbisaillon#6447 on [Discord](https://discord.com/channels/417762285172555786/765994894749597697/921426527248334869)*

item.title: How to update Scrypto simulator
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
1. Pull the latest changes from GitHub - radixdlt/radixdlt-scrypto: Asset-oriented Programming for DeFi.
  2. rustup update stable
  3. cargo install --path ./simulator
  4. resim reset

Solution by cbisaillon#6447 on Discord

Read full topic
